summary: Implemented a reusable AABoxes pink token in CSS and exposed it to Tailwind, then conditionally applied it as the background for all non-home routes via the root layout. However, the diff provides no verifiable evidence that the chosen pink was sampled from image-12.png, and it appears to include multiple unrelated UI/content changes outside the stated scope/non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: The chosen pink must be sampled from the uploaded AABoxes logo screenshot (image-12.png), not manually substituted with an unrelated pink.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a new token value `--aaboxes-pink: oklch(60% 0.25 340)` but contains no evidence (e.g., reference, calculation, comment, or sampling artifact) demonstrating it was extracted/sampled from image-12.png rather than chosen arbitrarily.

hallucinated_features.description: Navigation header changes including removing the Admin button/handlers/imports.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also risks violating the non-goal of not changing UI text/translations or unrelated UI behavior.
